item.description:
Come to a three hour workshop from 7PM-10PM.  The teacher Ma Qing Xiong will demonstrate the technique of Chinese painting.  He has taught Chinese painting for many years at MIT, Ink Piano Studio, GBCCA, and various other places.   

For each class:  He will demonstrate and explain the entire painting process.  He will paint the subject step by step, allowing time for students to follow along. By the end of the class you will have an entire painting and have practiced several techniques.  It will be fun and educational.

All levels are welcome!

We provide all the materials.  Just bring yourself.  $25/person, cash or check only.

Parking lot next to the building is free after 6PM or park on the streets(just read the signs).  Limited to six people.  I'll give you the phone number after you sign up.  We'll meet in front of the building at 6:45PM.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese Painting Workshop
